## Rotation interface

旋转参数(角度) heading：偏航角 pitch：俯仰角 roll：翻滚角

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface Rotation
```

## Properties

| Property                                 | Modifiers | Type   | Description         |
| ---------------------------------------- | --------- | ------ | ------------------- |
| [heading?](./cesium.rotation.heading) |           | number | _(Optional)_ 偏航角 |
| [pitch?](./cesium.rotation.pitch)     |           | number | _(Optional)_ 俯仰角 |
| [roll?](./cesium.rotation.roll)       |           | number | _(Optional)_ 翻滚角 |
